statements:
UPDATE landfill_capacity
SET capacity_in_tons = 500
WHERE landfill_id = 1

UPDATE landfill_capacity
SET landfill_name = 'New Site'
WHERE landfill_id = 2

UPDATE landfill_capacity
SET waste_type = 'Organic'
WHERE landfill_id = 3
UPDATE landfill_capacity SET capacity_in_tons = 500 WHERE landfill_id = 1;
UPDATE landfill_capacity SET capacity_in_tons = 600, waste_type = 'Organic' WHERE landfill_id = 2;
UPDATE landfill_capacity SET disposal_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE landfill_id = 3;
UPDATE landfill_capacity SET capacity = 500 WHERE landfill_id = 1;
UPDATE waste_disposal_statistics SET weight = 1000 WHERE disposal_id = 3;
UPDATE landfill_capacity SET location = 'New Location' WHERE landfill_id = 2;
UPDATE landfill_capacity SET capacity = capacity * 1.1 WHERE landfill_id = 1;
UPDATE waste_disposal_statistics SET weight = weight * 0.9 WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic';
UPDATE landfill_capacity SET location = 'New Location' WHERE landfill_id = 2;
UPDATE landfill_capacity SET capacity = 500 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE landfill_capacity SET capacity = 700 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE landfill_capacity SET capacity = 600 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE landfill_capacity SET capacity = 5000 WHERE landfill_name = 'Landfill A';
UPDATE landfill_capacity SET capacity = 7000 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE landfill_capacity SET capacity = capacity + 1000 WHERE landfill_name = 'Landfill B';
UPDATE landfill_capacity SET capacity = 10000 WHERE landfill_id = 1;
UPDATE waste_disposal_statistics SET amount = 500 WHERE disposal_id = 1;
UPDATE landfill_location SET location = 'New Location' WHERE landfill_id = 2;
UPDATE landfill_capacity SET capacity = capacity * 1.1 WHERE landfill_id = 1
UPDATE waste_disposal_statistics SET amount = amount * 0.9 WHERE disposal_id = 100
UPDATE landfill_location SET location = 'New Location', latitude = 40.7128, longitude = -74.0060 WHERE landfill_id = 2
UPDATE landfill_sites SET location = 'New Location' WHERE site_id = 1;
UPDATE waste_disposal_records SET amount_collected = 500.00 WHERE record_id = 3;
UPDATE landfill_statistics SET date = TIMESTAMP '2022-10-15 08:00:00' WHERE statistic_id = 2;
UPDATE landfill_sites SET capacity = capacity * 1.1 WHERE site_id = 1;
UPDATE waste_disposal_records SET amount_collected = amount_collected * 1.05 WHERE site_id = 2 AND date >= '2022-01-01';
UPDATE landfill_statistics SET amount_collected = amount_collected * 1.2 WHERE site_id = 3 AND waste_category = 1;
